name: Fureality
description:
FUREALITY is a game about splitting and joining realities. Join our very special Felis Catus on a daring escape from a research lab. To escape, you will need to use your wits and smashing good looks to solve these puzzles. 

E - Switch between realities (blue/pink) 

Space - Pick up and drop 

Q - Merge Esc - Menu 

Team: The Background Cats 

Design: Everyone 

Art: Lukahna, Brendan 

Animation: Lukahna 

Scripting: Dave, Terra, Bernice 

Music/SFX: Evan 

Levels: Shawn, Terra 

UI/UX: Shawn
